Q_DESC:
Create a class called Hello. Include 2 data members named name (string) and course{string) Include a function named initializeData() to initialize the values of the 2 data members. It accepts 2 arguments and its return type is void. The first argument corresponds to the name and the second argument corresponds to the course name. 
Include a function named speak() that does not accept any arguments and its return type is void. Print a welcome message multiple times in this function. The number of times the welcome message is printed depends on the number of characters in the name. 
In the main method create an object of type Hello and the object invokes the 2 methods. 
Input and Output Format : 
Refer sample input and output for formatting specifications. 
All text in bold corresponds to the input and the rest corresponds to output.
TESTCASE_1:
Jacob BTECH M
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Hello Mr. Jacob Welcome to BTECH
Hello Mr. Jacob Welcome to BTECH
Hello Mr. Jacob Welcome to BTECH
Hello Mr. Jacob Welcome to BTECH
Hello Mr. Jacob Welcome to BTECH
TESTCASE_2:
RADHA DOCTOR F
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Hello Ms. RADHA Welcome to DOCTOR
Hello Ms. RADHA Welcome to DOCTOR
Hello Ms. RADHA Welcome to DOCTOR
Hello Ms. RADHA Welcome to DOCTOR
Hello Ms. RADHA Welcome to DOCTOR
